scripts.js: npm run tsc && node exportScript.js jsexport.js
scripts.userscript: npm run tsc && node exportScript.js userscriptmain.js
scripts.webextension: npm run tsc && node exportScript.js webextensionmain.js
scripts.zip: node -e "var AdmZip = require('adm-zip'); var zip = new AdmZip(); zip.addLocalFolder('dist'); zip.writeZip('straykitty.zip')"
scripts.webextension-release: npm run webextension && npm run zip
